title: Bloomberg Law Brief: New Suit Over Keystone Xl Pipeline (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: New Suit Over Keystone Xl Pipeline (Audio)
description:
Deborah Sivas, Director of the Environmental Law Clinic at Stanford University Law School, discusses the latest legal challenges to the Keystone XL pipeline, which President Trump approved earlier this year. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
